page.title: 11WORKING MEN'S CLUBS
page.content: WHEN WE TOURED OUR AREA IN THE SCHOOL BUS WE COUNTED 16 WORKING MEN'S CLUBS. THERE ARE PROBABLY MORE BECAUSE WE DIDN'T TRAVEL ALONG EVERY ROAD. THE NEAREST ONE TO OUR SCHOOL IS THE SWAITHE W.M.C. AND WE ASKED THE SECRETARY ABOUT IT. HE SAID THE CLUB OPENED IN 1957 AND THAT IT WAS OPEN EVERY DAY AT LUNCHTIME AND AT NIGHT. THERE WAS A MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE OF 17, A STEWARD AND HIS WIFE. 4 BAR STAFF AND 3 CLEANERS. THERE WAS A MEMBERSHIP OF ABOUT 3OOO, AND REGULAR ACTIVITIES INCLUDED POOL, BINGO, CARDS AND DARTS. REGULAR MUSICAL AND CONCERT EVENING ARE HELD AND DANCING EVERY FRIDAY. THERE WAS ALSO A BOWLS SECTION AND A FOOTBALL CLUB, AND EVERY YEAR A CHILDREN'S OUTING WAS ORGANISED TO THE SEA-SIDE.
